articles.title: 'Sad day for America': Trump after not guilty plea in 2020 election 'lies' case - India Today
articles.description: Former US President Donald Trump, who is the frontrunner for the 2024 Republican presidential nomination, pleaded not guilty on Thursday to charges he orchestrated a plot to try to overturn his 2020 election loss. He said it was a "very sad day for America".
